## 

Hello! My name is Natasa and this is my personal page! You're welcome to explore and enjoy!

#### **Bio** {style="margin-top: 10px;"}

👩🏻‍💻 Bioinformatics Scientist - Computational Biologist (Institute of Applied Biosciences \| CERTH)

👩🏻‍🔬 M.Sc. Translational Research in Biomedicine (Molecular Biology & Genetics Department \| DUTh)

🧬 B.Sc. Biochemistry and Biotechnology (Biochemistry & Biotechnology Department \| UTh)

#### **Current position** {style="margin-top: 25px;"}

Bioinformatics Scientist in [Bioinformatics lab](https://biodataanalysisgroup.github.io/), under the supervision of [Dr. Psomopoulos](https://scholar.google.com/citations?user=Fp0LAqsAAAAJ&hl=el&oi=sra), at the [Institute of Applied Biosciences](https://www.inab.certh.gr/) (INAB), situated within the [Centre for Research & Technology, Hellas](https://www.certh.gr/root.en.aspx) (CERTH).
